short.ar: أطلق النار على الأهداف بأنواع مختلفة من الأسلحة وحاول تحقيق أعلى الدرجات.
short.am: በተለያዩ የጦር መሳሪያዎች ዒላማዎችን ተኩሱ እና ከፍተኛ ውጤት ለማግኘት ይሞክሩ.
short.bg: Стреля цели с различни видове оръжия и се опитват да направят най-висок резултат.
short.bn: বিভিন্ন ধরণের অস্ত্র দিয়ে লক্ষ্যগুলি অঙ্কুর করুন এবং সর্বোচ্চ স্কোর করার চেষ্টা করুন।
short.ca: Dispara objectius amb diferents tipus d'armes i intenta obtenir la màxima puntuació.
short.cs: Střílejte cíle s různými typy zbraní a snažte se dosáhnout nejvyššího skóre.
short.da: Skyd mål med forskellige typer våben og prøv at få den højeste score.
short.de: Schießen Sie mit verschiedenen Waffentypen auf Ziele und versuchen Sie, die höchste Punktzahl zu erzielen.
short.el: Πυροβολήστε στόχους με διαφορετικούς τύπους όπλων και προσπαθήστε να κάνετε την υψηλότερη βαθμολογία.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Shoot targets with different types of weapons and try to make the highest score.
short.es: Dispara a objetivos con diferentes tipos de armas e intenta obtener la puntuación más alta.
short.et: Tulistage sihtmärke erinevat tüüpi relvadega ja proovige teha kõrgeim tulemus.
short.fa: ساقه اهداف با انواع مختلف سلاح و سعی کنید به بالاترین نمره.
short.fi: Ammu kohteita erityyppisillä aseilla ja yritä tehdä korkein pistemäärä.
short.fil: Shoot target na may iba't ibang uri ng mga armas at subukan upang gawin ang pinakamataas na puntos.
short.fr: Tirez sur des cibles avec différents types d’armes et essayez d’obtenir le score le plus élevé.
short.gu: વિવિધ પ્રકારના શસ્ત્રોથી લક્ષ્યો શૂટ કરો અને ઉચ્ચતમ સ્કોર બનાવવાનો પ્રયાસ કરો.
short.he: לירות במטרות עם סוגים שונים של כלי נשק ולנסות לעשות את הציון הגבוה ביותר.
short.hi: हथियारों के विभिन्न प्रकार के साथ लक्ष्य गोली मारो और उच्चतम स्कोर बनाने की कोशिश करो।
short.hr: Pucajte na mete različitim vrstama oružja i pokušajte postići najviši rezultat.
short.hu: Lőj le célpontokat különböző típusú fegyverekkel, és próbáld meg a legmagasabb pontszámot elérni.
short.id: Tembak target dengan berbagai jenis senjata dan cobalah untuk membuat skor tertinggi.
short.it: Spara a bersagli con diversi tipi di armi e cerca di ottenere il punteggio più alto.
short.ja: 武器の異なるタイプでターゲットを撃つと、最高のスコアを作るしてみてください。
short.kn: ವಿವಿಧ ರೀತಿಯ ಆಯುಧಗಳಿಂದ ಗುರಿಗಳನ್ನು ಶೂಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ಅತ್ಯಧಿಕ ಸ್ಕೋರ್ ಮಾಡಲು ಪ್ರಯತ್ನಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 다양한 종류의 무기로 표적을 쏘고 가장 높은 점수를 얻으려고 노력하십시오.
short.lv: Šaujiet mērķus ar dažāda veida ieročiem un mēģiniet sasniegt augstāko rezultātu.
short.ml: വ്യത്യസ്ത തരം ആയുധങ്ങൾ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് ടാർഗെറ്റുകൾ ഷൂട്ട് ചെയ്യുകയും ഏറ്റവും ഉയർന്ന സ്കോർ നേടാൻ ശ്രമിക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുക.
short.mr: वेगवेगळ्या प्रकारच्या शस्त्रांनी लक्ष्य शूट करा आणि सर्वोच्च स्कोअर करण्याचा प्रयत्न करा.
short.ms: Menembak sasaran dengan pelbagai jenis senjata dan cuba membuat skor tertinggi.
short.nl: Schiet op doelen met verschillende soorten wapens en probeer de hoogste score te behalen.
short.no: Skyt mål med ulike typer våpen og prøve å gjøre den høyeste poengsummen.
short.pl: Strzelaj do celów różnymi rodzajami broni i staraj się uzyskać najwyższy wynik.
short.ro: Trage obiective cu diferite tipuri de arme și să încerce să facă cel mai mare scor.
short.ru: Стреляйте по мишеням из разных видов оружия и старайтесь набрать наибольшее количество очков.
short.sk: Strieľajte na ciele rôznymi typmi zbraní a snažte sa dosiahnuť najvyššie skóre.
short.sl: Ustrelil cilje z različnimi vrstami orožja in poskusite narediti najvišji rezultat.
short.sv: Skjut mål med olika typer av vapen och försök att göra högsta poäng.
short.sw: Piga malengo na aina tofauti za silaha na kujaribu kupata alama ya juu zaidi.
short.ta: ஆயுதங்கள் பல்வேறு வகையான கொண்டு இலக்குகளை சுட மற்றும் மிக உயர்ந்த மதிப்பெண் செய்ய முயற்சி.
short.te: వివిధ రకాల ఆయుధాలతో లక్ష్యాలను షూట్ చేయండి మరియు అత్యధిక స్కోరు చేయడానికి ప్రయత్నించండి.
short.th: ยิงเป้าหมายด้วยอาวุธประเภทต่าง ๆ และพยายามทําคะแนนสูงสุด
short.tr: Farklı silah türleriyle hedefleri vurun ve en yüksek puanı almaya çalışın.
short.uk: Стріляйте по мішенях різними видами зброї і намагайтеся зробити найвищий бал.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to hit all the targets with 4 different weapons! Show yourself with gun shot, one of the best shooter games. Gun Shot is an adrenaline-filled gun-shooting simulator. It offers a realistic shooting experience with its 2D graphics and impressive sound effects. The game has four different weapon options, each with its unique features. The game's main aim is to get the highest score by making accurate shots on the target boards. Shots that seem easy at first become more challenging with moving target boards as you progress.

In Gun Shot, you'll test your focus and reaction skills while improving your shooting skills. You can determine your strategy by switching between different weapons. While you will be proud of the points you have achieved at first, you will experience a difficult struggle as the target boards move and accelerate in the later levels of the game.

Thanks to the fun and addictive nature of Gun Shot, you will constantly try to achieve higher scores. The fast-paced shooting in the game will immerse you with realistic graphics and original sound effects. The excitement of each shot and the satisfaction of success is one of the most essential features of Gun Shot.

Gun Shot is easy to play and provides an experience suitable for players of all ages. You will have fun while testing your quick reflexes. Every game experience will be different, with combinations of weapons and target boards.

Gun Shot is the game for you if you're looking for a fast-paced and fun gun shooting experience. Try to get the best scores by showing your skills in challenging levels. With Gun Shot, you will have pleasant moments while hitting your targets and revealing your competitive spirit.

How To Play
Played with Mouse.

Gun Shot Action Game Features
✓ Infinity Level
✓ 3+ Weapon
✓ Basic control
✓ Little Particle

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Gun Shot Action Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
